name: Paratrooper Egg
description:
You are a paratrooper egg that needs to reach earth, after you stole back your precious egg from the evil spider.

Help the paratrooper egg reach earth by avoiding obstacles, collecting gold coins and using powerful paratrooper parachutes abilities.
Controls:
Swipe your finger to the right to move right.
Swipe your finger to the left to move left.

Collect enough gold to buy different parachutes with great different abilities.
You can always upgrade your current parachute ability to become much more powerful!

Enjoy an changeling, awesome graphics, original music and sweet game play.
